overview: Writer-director Edward Chitate helms his first feature film, a romantic drama following a girl with sickle cell disease. Unfortunately, the inherited condition that makes her body's red blood cells hard and pointed instead of soft and round also makes her life a lot more complicated. The young cast includes Will Robertson, Taira Soo, Daya Vaidya and David Haines (who played Muhammad Ali's older brother in Michael Mann's 2001 biopic Ali).
title: Almost Too Late
